Tip of the Day
Being overencumbered only slows down your activities, but doesn't affect travel.

Ectoplasm
Type: Material
Value: 0
Fine Value: 0
Keywords: Misc.
Processed
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A refined piece of ghostly energy that looks and feels slimy to the touch. Ghosts value it in this form and it still even has other uses.

The Ectoplasm item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Ectoplasm is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe

Activity Name Location Quantity
